name: AiRace Speed
description:
Let your Nintendo 3DS™ discover the true meaning of speed and adrenaline with AiRace Speed.

Take the challenge and enjoy a new gaming experience:

• Fly extreme speeds across 22 adrenaline-fuelled tracks

• Stunning environments packed with challenging obstacles

• Take control of one of 5 high-speed, futuristic jets

• High-performance graphics and immersive 3D effects

• Compete in online leaderboards and unlock achievements

• Third game of the successful and highly rated AiRace series
